brief.content-text:
Three Diagrams

Diagram 1, Image
The diagram is a screen shot of the Internet protocol (TCP/IP) properties window in Windows. The IP address text box is highlighted and the address in the box is 192.168.1.5.

A woman is sitting at her work station looking at her PC (showing the before mentioned screen). There is a speech bubble in the diagram, as follows:

The PC says, I see you have assigned me an IP address of 11000000101010000000000100000101. Now other hosts can find me.
